tweetSweep.name: tweetsweep
tweetSweep.description: web-app created using create-react-app which scrapes twitters api for recent & most interacted with tweets (retweets/likes) using a keyword that you enter. server side in node using twitter client

whosThatPokemon.name: who's that pokémon
whosThatPokemon.description: a pokémon guessing game, created using create-react-app. pokemon figures loaded from pokeapi

roller3D.name: roller 3d
roller3D.description: simple premise of rolling a ball around while collecting cubes to unlock next level. experimenting with unity3d and level creation based on retro video games

galaxy.name: galaxy
galaxy.description: game based on classic galaga, where boss follows you and you must avoid it and shoot it down before it kills you

about.main: i'm currently working remotely out of waterloo, ontario
about.par1: i started programming around 10 years ago. since i was a kid, i was fascinated by video game develpoment and was always intrigued by games like the legend of zelda, pokemon and super mario
about.par2: video games drew me to the field, however what kept me here was the ability to flesh out any idea or project i wanted to and have the ability to work on industry changing products
about.par3: i'm still a gamer - my pc, switch and i are inseparable...but i also love playing and watching sports, getting bubble tea or sushi with friends and hitting the gym

nuvalence.name: nuvalence
nuvalence.description: variety of languages & platforms including node, react, gcp & aws. implemented translations end to end for notifications & emails allowing for acquisition of international clients. unified and improved messaging development work streams granting developers a consistent experience across the platform. working directly with clients to develop structured front-end code and modularizing so files are more manageable. led & performed several co-op/internship interviews.

lifion.name: lifion by adp
lifion.description: primarily using nodejs. migrated messaging queue from amazon kinesis to amazon sqs, phasing out deprecated technology due to lack of support of kinesis. introduced honeycomb library to trace core etl functions and provide visualizations of data reducing time spent on debugging and searching through logs. overhauled error handling modules to reduce debugging & adding consistent behaviours. removed babel from major projects to speed up compilation and remove module dependencies.

faire.name: faire
faire.description: primarily using react. integrated fedex shipping label generation into returns to let customers easily make returns on shipped items. created numerous emails using moustache to be sent out to customers to promote sales and improve retention. shipped several features to production in fast-paced, startup environment in a team of less than 10.

bespoke.name: bespoke metrics
bespoke.description: implemented audit system for data admins validating user entered data & ensuring important info is not missing on applications to improve approval time. internationalized web application allowing for users to view site in language of choice. created auto formatting behaviours for fields for customers to easily enter dates, numbers, addresses, etc.

opentext.name: opentext
opentext.description: automated tests for new product used by thousands of customers using selenium & webdriver. created manual test cases to thoroughly test all edge cases. optimized tests to run 100% faster by caching data.

canada.name: environment canada
canada.description: implemented bash script that backed up users hard drive to an ssd that was required for all employees. created python script to help sort & manage researcher's data daily findings & provide data to be consumed by front-end to display data. fixed a few printers
